subproject.corporate outcome: Strengthened capacities of inter-sectoral and regional entities to formulate and implement policies and strategies aimed at addressing the development impacts of pandemics, including the gender dimensions; 2)  An enabled policy and institutional framework for effective home-based care.
subproject.description:
Output 1: Created an enabling policy environment for service delivery
Output 2: Improved Service Delivery at all levels of the public service, in the nine SACI countries, including the recognition of NGOs, CBOs and private sectors  as partners as well as utilizing new technologies for expanded outreach.
Output 3: Ensured that national resources and UNVs are available in the short term (over a three year period) through placement of UNV specialists (preference will be given to national and regional UNVs) and short Term Advisory Resources in strategic positions recognizing that the rate of losses surpasses the capacity to replace.
Output 4: Ensure that human resources outputs from tertiary institutions are aligned with demand for new skills
subproject.title: RAF/03/015 - SACI - RSC
